node.statement: STEP 6 - CONCLUSION (Lemma 15): By Lemma 15 (VALIDATED), since H >= A_N (Step 4): (Case 1) If n, k, m are all odd, then by Step 5 all generators are even, so H <= A_N, thus H = A_N. (Case 2) Otherwise, at least one of n, k, m is even, so by Step 5 H contains an odd generator, thus H contains an odd permutation and H = S_N. QED.
